name: Dale Earnhardt Sr.
title: American race car driver
quote: Okay, just wondering.
context: after asking teammate Andy Pilgrim if he had any advice for him prior to his fatal crash in the 2001 Daytona 500

name: Timothy McVeigh
title: American domestic terrorist
quote: It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul.
context: Convicted of the Oklahoma City bombing, McVeigh chose "Invictus" (Latin for "unconquered"), an 1875 poem by the British poet William Ernest Henley, as his final statement prior to his execution by lethal injection

name: Mohamed Atta
title: Egyptian terrorist and ringleader of the September 11 attacks
quote: Nobody move, please. We are going back to the airport. Don't try to make any stupid moves.
context: last recorded words before he crashed American Airlines Flight 11 into the North Tower of the World Trade Center, killing himself and 91 others aboard the flight and around 1,600 others in the North Tower

name: Betty Ong
title: American flight attendant aboard American Airlines Flight 11
quote: No. Somebody's calling medical and we can't get a doc—
context: on a phone call, in response to Operations Specialist Nydia Gonzalez asking if she had tried calling anyone else for help treating stab victims on the plane

name: Madeline Amy Sweeney
title: American flight attendant aboard American Airlines Flight 11
quote: I see water. I see buildings. I see buildings! We are flying low. We are flying very, very low. We are flying way too low. Oh, my God we are flying way too low. Oh, my God!
context: over the phone to manager Michael Woodward

name: Todd Beamer
title: American passenger aboard United Airlines Flight 93
quote: Are you guys ready? Let's roll.
context: signaling the start of the revolt against the flight's hijackers, resulting in the plane crashing in the ensuing struggle for the controls, killing all 44 aboard

name: Jeremy Glick
title: American passenger on United Airlines Flight 93
quote: We're going to rush the hijackers.
context: over the phone to his wife prior to the revolt

name: Lauren Grandcolas
title: American passenger aboard United Airlines Flight 93
quote: Jack, pick up sweetie, can you hear me? Okay. I just want to tell you, there's a little problem with the plane. I'm fine. I'm totally fine. I just want to tell you how much I love you.
context: last message sent to her husband Jack

name: Ziad Jarrah
title: Lebanese terrorist of the September 11 attacks
quote: Hey! Hey! Give it to me! Give it to me! Give it to me! Give it to me! Give it to me! Give it to me! Give it to me! Give it to me!
context: last words recorded on the cockpit voice recorder during the passenger revolt before he crashed United Airlines Flight 93 into Shanksville, killing himself and 43 others aboard the flight

name: Saeed al-Ghamdi
title: Saudi terrorist of the September 11 attacks
quote: Allah is the greatest. Allah is the greatest.
context: last words, the takbir, recorded on the cockpit voice recorder during the crash of United Airlines Flight 93 into Shanksville, killing all aboard the flight

name: Kevin Cosgrove
title: American business executive employed at the South Tower of the World Trade Center
quote: We're looking in... We're overlooking the Financial Center. Three of us... Two broken windows... Oh, God! Oh!
context: over the phone to a 911 dispatcher, who he called from the 105th floor. His last words were uttered when the South Tower collapsed

name: Gregory Reda
title: American manager employed by Marsh McLennan at the North Tower of the World Trade Center
quote: Fie  [sic] here Love yous
context: texting his coworker Michael Cantatore from the 95th floor, one of the impact floors

name: Bill Biggart
title: American photo journalist
quote: I'm safe, I'm with the firemen.
context: message to his wife before dying in the collapse of the North Tower

name: ("Aku tak akan mati.") — Mona Fandey
title: Malaysian pop singer, bomoh, and murderer
quote: I will never die.
context: prior to execution by hanging

name: George Harrison
title: English musician and songwriter
quote: Love one another.
context: to his wife, Olivia Harrison, and son, Dhani Harrison

name: J. Clifford Baxter
title: Enron executive
quote: Carol, I am so sorry for this. I feel I just can't go on. I have always tried to do the right thing but where there was once great pride now it's gone. I love you and the children so much. I just can't be any good to you or myself. The pain is overwhelming. Please try to forgive me. Cliff—J. Clifford Baxter.
context: ; his suicide note, addressed to his wife. Baxter had been slated to testify before United States congressional committees concerning the Enron scandal

name: ("Für heute reicht es
title: Herr Heise!") — Robert Steinhäuser, German student and perpetrator of the Erfurt school massacre
quote: That's enough for today, Mr. Heise!
context: said to a teacher prior to committing suicide

name: (Ik vond het ontzettend gezellig. Het had de diepgang van een plas water.) — Pim Fortuyn
title: Dutch politician
quote: I found it very enjoyable. It had the depth of a puddle of water.
context: Fortuyn was asked about the quality of an interview he was attending with Ruud de Wild. Shortly following the interview, he was assassinated by gunshot

name: John Entwistle
title: English musician and bassist for The Who
quote: Goodnight for the 4th time.
context: stated to groupie Alycen Rowse before going to sleep in bed with her

name: ("국민 여러분
title: 담배 맛있습니까? 그거 독약입니다. 저도 하루에 두 갑씩 피웠습니다. 하... 지금은 정말 후회합니다. 1년 전에만 끊었어도 말입니다. 국민 여러분, 담배는 가정과 건강을 파괴합니다. 국민 여러분, 담배 끊어야 합니다. ") — Lee Ju-il, Korean politician and comedian
quote: My fellow citizens, do cigarettes taste good? They are poisonous. I used to smoke two packs a day. Ha... I really regret it now. If only I had quit a year ago. My fellow citizens, cigarettes destroy families and health. My fellow citizens, you must quit smoking.
context: died from lung cancer caused by smoking

name: Aileen Wuornos
title: American prostitute and serial killer
quote: Yes, I would just like to say I'm sailing with the rock, and I'll be back, like Independence Day, with Jesus. June 6, like the movie. Big mother ship and all, I'll be back, I'll be back.
context: prior to execution by lethal injection

name: Richard Harris
title: Irish actor and singer
quote: It was the food!
context: while being wheeled out of the Savoy Hotel

name: Philip Berrigan
title: American peace activist and former Roman Catholic priest
quote: I die with the conviction, held since 1968 and Catonsville, that nuclear weapons are the scourge of the earth; to mine for them, manufacture them, deploy them, use them, is a curse against God, the human family, and the earth itself.
context: ; final statement dictated to his wife, Elizabeth McAlister

name: Brandon Vedas (also known by his nickname ripper on IRC)
title: American computer enthusiast, recreational drug user and member of the Shroomery.org community
quote: I told u I was hardcore [...] u are so fucking stupid
context: who died of a multiple drug overdose while discussing what he was doing via IRC chat and webcam. "I told u I was hardcore" was one of the last things Vedas typed, a phrase often quoted sarcastically on Internet message boards and discussion sites

name: Stephen Oake
title: QGM, Greater Manchester Police counter-terrorism detective
quote: Help me, help me.
context: while being stabbed in the chest by Algerian illegal immigrant Kamel Bourgass

name: Rick Husband
title: American astronaut
quote: Roger, uh, bu-
context: final transmission received prior to the disintegration of Space Shuttle Columbia during reentry

name: Fred Rogers
title: American television host, writer, producer, and minister
quote: Am I a sheep?
context: question he'd given to his wife Joanne in reference to the Last Judgment of the Bible

name: Adam Faith
title: English singer and actor
quote: Channel 5 is all shit, isn't it? Christ, the crap they put on there. It's a waste of space.

name: (「Depression！！多謝各位朋友 多謝麥列菲菲 呢一年真好辛苦 不能再忍受 多謝唐唐 多謝家人 多謝肥姐 我一生無做壞事 為何會怎樣？？？」) — Leslie Cheung
title: Hong Kong singer and actor
quote: Depression! Many thanks to all my friends. Many thanks to Professor Felice Lieh-Mak (Cheung's last psychiatrist). This year has been so tough. I can't stand it anymore. Many thanks to Tong Tong (nickname for Cheung's boyfriend Daffy Tong). Many thanks to my family. Many thanks to Sister Fei. In my life I have done nothing bad. Why does it have to be like this?
context: on his suicide note, before jumping from the 24th floor of the Mandarin Oriental hotel in Hong Kong

name: Barry White
title: American singer and songwriter
quote: Leave me alone, I'm fine.
context: to a nurse

name: Bob Hope
title: American actor and comedian
quote: Surprise me.
context: on being asked by his wife, Dolores Hope, where he wanted to be buried

name: Edward Teller
title: Hungarian-American physicist
quote: I should have been a concert pianist.

name: John Ritter
title: American actor
quote: I love you
context: given in sign language to his wife Amy Yasbeck when being transported in the hospital on a gurney

name: Johnny Cash
title: American singer-songwriter
quote: It's time.
context: responding to his physical therapist after being unable to complete any of his therapy for the day due to his extremely poor health. Later that day he was rushed to the hospital where he died after his health suddenly plummeted

name: Donald O'Connor
title: American actor, dancer and singer
quote: I'd like to thank the Academy for my lifetime achievement award that I will eventually get.
context: spoken to his family at his bedside. As of 2025, he has not received the Lifetime Achievement Award

name: Dwain Weston
title: Australian BASE jumper
quote: Jeb. Just remember, whatever happens, happens.
context: to fellow skydiver Jeb Corliss prior to fatal wingsuit flight over the Royal Gorge Bridge, during which he struck the bridge while flying at 120 miles per hour (190 km/h)

name: Ricardo Alfonso Cerna
title: Guatemalan criminal
quote: Thank you.
context: to a police officer who gave him a bottle of water, seconds before committing suicide with his .45-caliber handgun, which he had concealed within his clothing

name: Cameron Todd Willingham
title: American convicted murderer
quote: Yeah. The only statement I want to make is that I am an innocent man - convicted of a crime I did not commit. I have been persecuted for 12 years for something I did not do. From God's dust I came and to dust I will return - so the earth shall become my throne. I gotta go, road dog. I love you Gabby. (Turning towards his ex-wife and the crowd) I hope you rot in hell, bitch. I hope you fucking rot in hell. You bitches. I hope you all fucking rot, cunts. (Lethal injection starts) That is it.
context: as his final statement prior to his execution by lethal injection. Willingham spent his last moments cursing his ex-wife and the crowd that came to witness his execution. The warden of the prison got so offended that he started out the execution to shut him up and Willingham flipped him the middle finger in response

name: ("Vi faccio vedere come muore un Italiano!") — Fabrizio Quattrocchi
title: Italian security officer
quote: Now I'll show you how an Italian dies!
context: to Islamist militant kidnappers in Iraq forcing him to dig his own grave while wearing a hood. Quattrocchi tried to pull the hood off and shouted his last words, and was then shot in the neck

name: Pat Tillman
title: American football player and Army Ranger
quote: What are you shooting at?! I'm Pat Tillman! I'm Pat fucking TILLMAN!
context: while being fatally wounded by friendly fire in Afghanistan

name: Nick Berg
title: American radio tower repairman
quote: My name is Nick Berg, my father's name is Michael, my mother's name is Suzanne. I have a brother and sister, David and Sara. I live in West Chester, Pennsylvania, near Philadelphia.
context: on video before beheading by Islamist militants

name: Jonathan Aurthur
title: American wetlands advocate and author
quote: I jumped near the entrance to the dam.
context: ; his suicide note, found in his car after he jumped to his death in Angeles National Forest

name: Dimebag Darrell (8 December 2004)
quote: Van Halen!
context: American guitarist shot on stage while performing with his new band, Damageplan

name: Dave Shaw
title: Australian commercial aviator and technical diver
quote: I look forward to taking that off.
context: referring to his dive mask at the beginning of a fatal dive to recover the body of Deon Dreyer

name: Dorothy Stang
title: American-Brazilian nun and activist
quote: Blessed are the poor in spirit ...
context: moments before she was shot to death

name: Hunter S. Thompson
title: American journalist and author
quote: Football Season Is Over. No More Games. No More Bombs. No More Walking. No More Fun. No More Swimming. 67. That is 17 years past 50. 17 more than I needed or wanted. Boring. I am always bitchy. No Fun – for anybody. 67. You are getting Greedy. Act your old age. Relax – This won't hurt.
context: in his suicide note, written four days before his death

name: Guy Henderson
title: Scottish pilot
quote: Logan Ambulance One base turn complete.
context: ; final radio transmission prior to air ambulance crashing off the coast of Scotland, killing Henderson and paramedic John Keith McCreanor

name: Jeff Weise
title: American animator, student, and perpetrator of the Red Lake High School shooting
quote: I have hostages!
context: yelled at police before he killed himself with a shotgun

name: ("Pozwólcie mi iść do domu Ojca.") — Pope John Paul II (2 April 2005)
quote: Let me go to the house of the Father.

name: William Donaldson
title: British satirist and playboy
quote: You're a lifesaver, Andy.
context: to the caretaker of his building, who had collected pills for him

name: Michael P. Murphy
title: United States Navy SEAL and Medal of Honor recipient
quote: Roger that, sir. Thank you.
context: ending a radio call for help after being shot during Operation Red Wings

name: George Best
title: Northern Irish football player
quote: Don't die like I did.
context: dying of complications from alcoholism

name: Clarence Ray Allen
title: American criminal
quote: My last words will be 'Hoka Hey, it's a good day to die.' Thank you very much. I love you all. Goodbye.
context: ; statement written prior to execution by lethal injection

name: Albert Scott Crossfield
title: American test pilot
quote: Atlanta, this is seven niner x-ray, I'd like to deviate south weather.
context: ; final radio transmission before dying in crash of Cessna 210A at age 84

name: David Sharp
title: English mountaineer
quote: My name is David Sharp. I'm with Asian Trekking, and I just want to sleep.
context: to a group of Sherpas while dying near the summit of Mount Everest

name: Jared C. Monti
title: United States Army soldier and Medal of Honor recipient
quote: I've made peace with God; tell my family that I love them.
context: mortally wounded by rocket-propelled grenade in Afghanistan

name: By Andrei Nikolaevich Khodnevich
title: the Trainee of Pulkovo Aviation Enterprise Flight 612, The aircraft crashed in Donetsk Oblast in eastern Ukraine, near the Russian border.
quote: I love you, mom!

name: Steve Irwin
title: Australian conservationist
quote: I'm dying.
context: to cameraman Justin Lyons after being pierced in the chest by a stingray barb

name: Peter Brock
title: Australian motor racing driver
quote: C'mon. Let's get this day over and done with.
context: to track marshal before dying in race crash

name: Carlo Acutis
title: Italian teenager who used the internet to promote Catholic devotion
quote: Mom, don't be afraid. Since Jesus became a man, death has become the passage towards life, and we don't need to flee it. Let us prepare ourselves to experience something extraordinary in the eternal life.
context: to his mother before falling into a coma from leukemia. He died one day later at the age of 15 and was canonized as a saint in 2025

name: Ross A. McGinnis
title: United States Army soldier and Medal of Honor recipient
quote: Grenade. ... It's in the truck.
context: prior to covering grenade with his body to protect the other soldiers in his vehicle

name: Augusto Pinochet
title: Chilean general and statesman
quote: Lucy.
context: calling his wife Lucía Hiriart by his affectionate name for her

name: James Brown
title: American musician
quote: I'm going away tonight.
context: to his manager Charles Bobbit, before dying in his sleep

name: Saddam Hussein
title: fifth President of Iraq
quote: There is no god but Allah, and Muhammad...
context: Saddam recited the Shahada twice as he was executed, dying as he said "and Muhammad" in his second recitation

name: ("Выписываемся.") — Boris Yeltsin
title: first President of Russia
quote: Checking out.
context: answering a doctor asking how he was before losing consciousness and dying from heart failure

name: Chris Benoit
title: Canadian professional wrestler
quote: My address is 130 Green Meadow Lane, Fayetteville, Georgia 30215
context: last text message sent to a co-worker before committing murder-suicide

name: Scott Bowerbank
title: American helicopter pilot for television station KTVK
quote: Looks like he's gonna try and take another vehicle here, we'll see if they block him in there. Looks like they've got him blocked in there but he did get- AAAAH-
context: describing police pursuit before Phoenix news helicopter collision killed all four people aboard both helicopters

name: Chauncey Bailey
title: American journalist
quote: Don't kill me.
context: to his murderer, Devaughndre Brousard

name: Alex the African grey parrot (6 September 2007)
quote: You be good, I love you. See you tomorrow.

name: ("Jeay Bhutto.") — Benazir Bhutto
title: Prime Minister of Pakistan
quote: Long live Bhutto.
context: immediately prior to assassination

name: Heath Ledger
title: Australian actor
quote: Katie, Katie, look, it'll be fine, you know, I just need to get some sleep.
context: on the phone to his sister before accidentally taking a lethal combination of prescription medications

name: Harvey Korman
title: American actor and comedian
quote: Tape Seinfeld for me.

name: Johnny Miller
title: American aviation pioneer
quote: I guess my flying days are over.
context: to his nephew while dying at the age of 102. Miller made his final flight at the age of 101

name: Captain Kyle Mosley (23 March 2009)
quote: Ride 'em, cowboys.
context: pilot of FedEx Express Flight 80; final transmission before the aircraft crashed upon landing

name: ("너무 많은 사람들에게 신세를 졌다. 나로 말미암아 여러 사람이 받은 고통이 너무 크다. 앞으로 받을 고통도 헤아릴 수가 없다. 여생도 남에게 짐이 될 일 밖에 없다. 건강이 좋지 않아서 아무것도 할 수가 없다. 책을 읽을 수도 글을 쓸 수도 없다.너무 슬퍼하지 마라. 삶과 죽음이 모두 자연의 한 조각 아니겠는가? 미안해하지 마라. 누구도 원망하지 마라. 운명이다. 화장해라. 그리고 집 가까운 곳에 아주 작은 비석 하나만 남겨라. 오래된 생각이다..") — Roh Moo-hyun
title: 9th President of South Korea
quote: I am in debt to so many people. I have caused too great a burden to be placed upon them. I can't begin to fathom the countless agonies down the road. The rest of my life would only be a burden for others. I am unable to do anything because of poor health. I can't read, I can't write. Do not be too sad. Isn't life and death all a part of nature? Do not be sorry. Do not feel resentment toward anyone. It is fate. Cremate me. And leave only a small tombstone near home. I've thought on this for a long time.
context: on his suicide note, before jumping from a cliff behind his home in Bongha Village

name: Farrah Fawcett
title: American actress
quote: Redmond
context: calling out the name of her son Redmond O'Neal

name: Michael Jackson
title: American musician
quote: More milk.
context: asking his doctor for more propofol shortly before he died from an overdose of the same drug

name: Edward Kenna
title: last living Australian Second World War recipient of the Victoria Cross
quote: Say goodnight to your mother if she's still awake.
context: to his daughter before dying in the same nursing home where his wife lived

name: Corazon Aquino
title: President of the Philippines
quote: Take care of each other.
context: to her family

name: Patrick Swayze
title: American actor
quote: I love you.
context: to his wife Lisa Niemi

name: Clifton Maloney
title: American businessman
quote: I'm the happiest man in the world. I've just summited a beautiful mountain.
context: prior to falling asleep and not waking up at Camp 2 on Cho Oyu

name: Michael Patrick Scusa
title: United States Army sergeant
quote: Are you ready?
context: prior to being shot in the neck at the Battle of Kamdesh in Afghanistan

name: Brittany Murphy
title: American actress
quote: Mom, I'm dying. I love you.
context: as she was about to die from pneumonia and multiple drug intake"Mom, I hope you have a good day at work and I love you very much. Love, Jennifer." — Jennifer Daugherty, American mentally handicapped woman who was tortured to death (11 February 2010), note written to her mother

name: Andrew Joseph Stack III
title: American embedded software developer
quote: Thanks for your help. Have a great day.
context: to air traffic control shortly before intentionally crashing his plane into an office building in Austin, Texas

name: Malcolm McLaren

quote: Free Leonard Peltier.
context: talking about political prisoner Leonard Peltier

name: Jeffrey Landrigan
title: American convicted murderer
quote: I'd like to say 'thank you' to my family for being here and all of my friends. Boomer Sooner.

name: Osama bin Laden
title: Islamist militant terrorist

name: Ryan Dunn

name: Amy Winehouse
title: English singer and songwriter
quote: I don't want to die.

name: Steve Jobs
title: American electronics businessman
quote: Oh wow. Oh wow. Oh wow.
context: looking at his family

name: Dan Wheldon
title: British motor racing driver
quote: I'm ready to go for this thing; we can win this thing.

name: Jimmy Savile
title: DJ and TV presenter
quote: It was a foreign virus. 'I've got a bounce back-ability, but this time I don't seem to be bouncing back...So many women so little time.
context: last interview four days before he died, in which he acknowledged he was in ill health and suffering from pneumonia. The last paragraph was in regards about Savile's 85th birthday, which would have taken place two days after his death. Savile was posthumously exposed as a predatory sex offender

name: Christopher Hitchens
title: English-American author, to his agent Steven Wasserman
quote: Capitalism... Downfall.

name: Whitney Houston
title: American musician
quote: I'm gonna go see Jesus, want to see Jesus.

name: Andrew Breitbart

quote: I called you a putz cause I thought you werebeing [sic] intentionally disingenuous. If not I apologize.@CenLamar @dust92

context: he spoke with NPR's Terry Gross in 2011, before he died at Danbury Hospital in Danbury, Connecticut, at age 83, due to complications from a stroke

name: Taruni Sachdev
title: Indian child actress and model
quote: I love you

name: Shriya Shah-Klorfine

quote: Save me.

name: Daniel Inouye
title: American lawyer and politician
quote: Aloha

name: Robert Gleason
title: American serial killer
quote: Well, I hope Percy ain't going to forget to wet the sponge. Put me on the highway to Jackson and call my Irish buddies. Póg mo thóin. God bless.

name: ("No quiero morir
title: por favor no me dejen morir.") — Hugo Chávez, Venezuelan statesman
quote: I don't want to die, please don't let me die.
context: whispering unable to speak

name: George Jones
title: American musician
quote: Well, hello there, I've been looking for you. My name's George Jones.
context: moments before dying in his hospital bed

name: ("Nole timere") — Seamus Heaney

name: Lou Reed

name: Paul Walker
title: American actor

name: Captain Zaharie Ahmad Shah (8 March 2014)

name: Elliot Rodger
title: American mass murderer
quote: You've forced me to suffer all my life and now I'll force you all suffer. I've waited a long time for this. I'll give you exactly what you deserve. All of you. All you girls who rejected me and looked down upon me and you know, treated me like scum while you gave yourselves to other men. And all of you men, for living a better life than me, all of you sexually active men, I hate you. I hate all of you. I can't wait to give you exactly what you deserve. Utter annihilation.
context: final statement in video titled "Elliot Rodger's Retribution", recorded the day before carrying out the 2014 Isla Vista killings

name: Eric Garner
title: American former horticulturist
quote: I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe. I can't breathe.

name: Michael Alsbury
title: American commercial astronaut
quote: Pitch up.

name: ("@ChavesRGB Aquí estoy. Un abrazo

name: Mango

name: Leonard Nimoy

name: Joshua Wheeler

quote: On me.

name: David Bowie
title: English singer-songwriter and actor

name: Terry Wogan
title: Irish radio and television broadcaster
quote: Everything's going to be all right, old boy.

name: Joey Feek
title: American country music singer and songwriter
quote: I love you.
context: to her husband, Rory Feek

name: ("Они снаружи. Это конец
title: командир. Спасибо, скажите моей семье и моей стране, что я люблю их. Скажите им, что я был смелым и сражался, пока не смог больше. Пожалуйста, позаботьтесь о моей семье, отомстите за мою смерть. Прощай, командир, передай моей семье, что я их люблю!") — Alexander Prokhorenko, Russian Armed Forces soldier who called an airstrike on his own position as he ran out of ammunition in a fight against ISIS fighters during the Palmyra offensive
quote: They are outside. This is the end, commander. Thank you, tell my family and my country I love them. Tell them I was brave and fought until I could no longer. Please, take care of my family, avenge my death. Goodbye commander, tell my family I love them!

name: Adam Kelly Ward
title: right before being executed

The families of Dominique Hurd, Jerrell Jenkins, Cecil Boren, Michael Greenwood. I was more than wrong. The crimes I perpetrated against you all was senseless, extremely hurtful and inexcusable. I humbly beg you your forgiveness, and pray you find the peace, healing, and closure, you all deserve. ... I'm not the person I was, I've been transformed. Some things can't be undone, I seek forgiveness.

name: Taliesin Myrddin Namkai-Meche after being fatally stabbed by Jeremy Joseph Christian in the 2017 Portland train attack (26 May 2017)
quote: Tell everyone on this train I love them.

title: s prijezirom odbacujem vašu presudu. To je otrov koji sam popio.") — Slobodan Praljak, Croatian general
quote: Judges! Slobodan Praljak is not a war criminal, with disdain, I reject this verdict. I have taken poison.

name: David Goodall

quote: It's good to be king. Wait, maybe. I think maybe I'm just like a little bizarre little person who walks back and forth. Whatever, you know, but...
context: in his last video, "Terry Davis: Rises to Throne"

name: Stan Lee
title: American comic book writer and publisher
quote: God bless. Take care of my boy, Roy.
context: to his successor, Roy Thomas

name: George H. W. Bush
title: president of the United States
quote: I love you, too.
context: speaking to his son George W. Bush

name: ("Hola hermanitos
title: ¿cómo andan loquitos locos? Hermano, estoy muerto. Estuve acá en Nantes haciendo cosas, cosas, cosas, cosas y cosas, y no terminás más y no terminás más y no terminás más y no terminás más. Así que nada, muchachos, estoy acá arriba del avión que parece que se está por caer a pedazos. Me estoy yendo para Cardiff, loco, que mañana sí ya arrancamos. A la tarde arrancamos a entrenar, muchachos, en mi nuevo equipo. A ver qué pasa. Así que, ¿cómo andan ustedes hermanitos, todo bien? Si en una hora y media no tienen novedades mías, no sé si van a mandar a alguien a buscarme porque no me encontrarán, pero ya saben... Papá, ¡qué miedo que tengo!") — Emiliano Sala, Argentine footballer
quote: Hello, my brothers, how are you? Boy, I'm tired. I was here in Nantes taking care of things, things, things, things, things, things, and it never stops, it never stops, it never stops. Anyway guys, I'm up in this plane that feels like it's falling to pieces, and I'm going to Cardiff. [It's] crazy, we start tomorrow. Training in the afternoon, guys, in my new team... Let's see what happens. So, how's it going with you guys, all good? If in an hour and a half you have no news from me, I don't know if they are going to send someone to look for me because they cannot find me, but you will know... Man, I'm scared!
context: last WhatsApp message sent to friends before his death in a plane crash

name: Haji Daoud Nabi (15 March 2019)
quote: Hello brother.

name: ("令和きれいだー。") — Wowaka

title: Peruvian statesman
quote: As no document mentions me and no indication or evidence reaches me, they only have SPECULATION or invent intermediaries. I never sold myself and it's proven.
context: final tweet, one day before committing suicide

I'm suffocating." — Cédric Chouviat, French deliveryman (5 January 2020), dying while restrained by Paris police

title: American actor
quote: Mike can get it done.

name: Hana Kimura
title: Japanese professional wrestler
quote: Nearly 100 frank opinions every day. I couldn't deny they hurt me. "Die", "you are disgusting", "you should disappear" I believed these things about myself more than they did. Thank you, Mother, for the gift of life. My whole life I wanted to be loved. Thank you to everyone who supported me. I love you all. I'm sorry for being weak.
context: last tweet before committing suicide

name: George Floyd
title: American former restaurant security guard
quote: My stomach hurts, my neck hurts, everything hurts ... Man, I can't breathe.
context: as Minneapolis Police Officer Derek Chauvin knelt on his neck for over nine minutes, asphyxiating him. Chauvin was later convicted for murdering Floyd

name: ("Io
title: Ennio Morricone, sono morto. Lo annuncio così a tutti gli amici che mi sono stati sempre vicino e anche a quelli un po' lontani che saluto con grande affetto. Impossibile nominarli tutti. Ma un ricordo particolare è per Peppuccio e Roberta, amici fraterni molto presenti in questi ultimi anni della nostra vita. C'è una sola ragione che mi spinge a salutare tutti così e ad avere un funerale in forma privata; non voglio disturbare. Saluto con tanto affetto Ines, Laura, Sara, Enzo e Norbert, per aver condiviso con me e la mia famiglia gran parte della mia vita. Voglio ricordare con amore le mie sorelle Adriana, Maria, Franca  e i loro cari e far sapere loro quanto gli ho voluto bene. Un saluto pieno, intenso e profondo ai miei figli Marco, Alessandra, Andrea, Giovanni, mia nuora Monica, e ai miei nipoti Francesca, Valentina, Francesco e Luca. Spero che comprendano quanto li ho amati. Per ultima, ma non per importanza, Maria. A lei rinnovo l'amore straordinario che ci ha tenuto insieme e che mi dispiace abbandonare. A Lei il più doloroso addio") — Ennio Morricone, Italian composer and conductor
quote: I, Ennio Morricone, am dead. So I announce it to all the friends who have always been close to me and also to those who are a little far away and I greet them with great affection. Impossible to name them all. But a special memory is for Peppuccio and Roberta, fraternal friends very present in the last years of our life. There is only one reason that drives me to greet everyone like this and to have a funeral in private; I don't want to disturb. I warmly greet Ines, Laura, Sara, Enzo and Norbert, for having shared a large part of my life with me and my family. I want to remember my sisters Adriana, Maria, Franca and their loved ones with love and let them know how much I loved them. A full, intense and profound greeting to my children Marco, Alessandra, Andrea, Giovanni, my daughter-in-law Monica, and to my grandchildren Francesca, Valentina, Francesco and Luca. I hope they understand how much I loved them. Last but not least, Maria. I renew to you the extraordinary love that has held us together and that I am sorry to abandon. The most painful farewell to you
context: writing his final obituary before dying in hospital

name: Naya Rivera
title: American actress, singer and model
quote: Help!
context: Shortly after jumping into Lake Piru to go swimming with her four-year-old son, she told him to get back onto their boat. She helped him back onto the boat; moments later she yelled "Help", with her arm in the air. However, she disappeared into the water

name: Chadwick Boseman
title: American actor
quote: It broke me, man, but we need to do that for them. People deserve abundant life, special moments. They've been through hell battling disease. If we were able to ease their suffering and bring joy for a moment, and hopefully moments (as) he goes through the bags, then we made a difference in his life.
context: his final text to a producer about sending a personalized message to a fan through the Make-A-Wish Foundation

name: Ronnie McNutt
title: American US States Army Reserve veteran
quote: Hey guys, I guess that's it.
context: right before committing suicide by shooting himself with a bolt action rifle

name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
title: Associate Justice of the United States Supreme Court
quote: My most fervent wish is that I will not be replaced until a new president is installed.
context: dictated to her granddaughter. Despite Ginsburg's wishes, Amy Coney Barrett was nominated to the Supreme Court on September 26 by President Donald Trump and confirmed by the Senate on October 26, while early and mail-in voting was under way for the 2020 U.S. Presidential Election

name: ("В моей смерти прошу винить Российскую Федерацию.") — Irina Slavina
title: Russian journalist

name: Daunte Wright
title: American man killed in police shooting
quote: For what, am I in trouble?

name: Brandon Hole
title: American mass shooter
quote: I hope that I can be with Applejack in the afterlife, my life has no meaning without her. If there's no afterlife and she isn't real then my life never mattered anyway.

name: Walter Mondale
title: American politician, former vice president of the United States
quote: Dear Team, well my time has come. I am eager to rejoin Joan and Eleanor. Before I Go I wanted to let you know how much you mean to me. Never has a public servant had a better group of people working at their side! Together we have accomplished so much and I know you will keep up the good fight. Joe in the White House certainly helps. I always knew it would be okay if I arrived some place and was greeted by one of you! My best to all of you!
context: final message to his staff

name: Edwin Edwards
title: American politician, former governor of Louisiana
quote: I love you too.

name: David Amess

name: Halyna Hutchins
title: Ukrainian cinematographer
quote: That was no good. That was no good at all.

name: Otis Anderson Jr.
title: American football player
quote: You shot me.
context: responding to his father after the latter fatally shot him

name: Betty White
title: American actress
quote: Allen.

name: Clarence Dixon
title: American murderer
quote: You are being as thorough as possible as you try to kill me. How twisted is this? You worship death don't you. Let's do this shit.
context: executed by lethal injection

name: Technoblade
title: American YouTuber and internet personality
quote: Hello everyone, Technoblade here. If you're watching this, I am dead. So let's sit down and have one final chat. My real name is Alex. I had one of my siblings call me Dave one time in a deleted video from 2016 and it was one of the most successful pranks we've ever done. Thousands of creepy online dudes trying to get overly personal going, "Oh hey Dave, how's it going?" Sorry for selling out so much in the past year, but thanks to everyone that bought hoodies, plushies and channel memberships. My siblings are going to college! Well if they want to, I don't wanna put any dead brother peer pressure on them. But that's all from me. Thank you all for supporting my content over the years. If I had another hundred lives, I think I would choose to be Technoblade again every single time, as those were the happiest years of my life. I hope you guys enjoyed my content and that I made some of you laugh. And I hope you all go on to live long, prosperous and happy lives, because I love you guys. Technoblade out.
context: written as part of his final message on his father's laptop, eight hours before his death from stage IV metastatic sarcoma. The message was read out by his father in a video titled "so long nerds"

name: ("彼はできない理由を考えるのではなく...") — Shinzo Abe
title: former prime minister of Japan and politician
quote: Instead of thinking about why he (Kei Satō) cannot do it...

name: Olivia Newton-John
title: British-Australian singer and actress
quote: My sunshine.
context: speaking to her daughter, Chloe Lattanzi; Lattanzi has implied that Newton-John lost her ability to speak some time before her death

name: ("Cari amici
title: mi spiace non essere più con voi dopo 70 anni assieme. Ma anche la natura ha i suoi ritmi. Sono stati anni per me molto stimolanti che mi hanno portato a conoscere il mondo e la natura umana. Soprattutto ho avuto la fortuna di conoscere gente che mi ha aiutato a realizzare quello che ogni uomo vorrebbe scoprire. Grazie alla scienza e a un metodo che permette di affrontare i problemi in modo razionale ma al tempo stesso umano. Malgrado una lunga malattia sono riuscito a portare a termine tutte le mie trasmissioni e i miei progetti (persino una piccola soddisfazione: un disco di jazz al pianoforte…). Ma anche, sedici puntate dedicate alla scuola sui problemi dell’ambiente e dell’energia. È stata un’avventura straordinaria, vissuta intensamente e resa possibile grazie alla collaborazione di un grande gruppo di autori, collaboratori, tecnici e scienziati. A mia volta, ho cercato di raccontare quello che ho imparato. Carissimi tutti, penso di aver fatto la mia parte. Cercate di fare anche voi la vostra per questo nostro difficile Paese. Un grande abbraccio") — Piero Angela, Italian science communicator
quote: Dear friends, I'm sorry to no longer be with you after 70 years together. But nature also has its own rhythms. They were very stimulating years for me that led me to learn about the world and human nature. Above all, I was lucky enough to meet people who helped me realize what every man would like to discover. Thanks to science and a method that allows us to address problems in a rational but at the same time humane way. Despite a long illness, I managed to complete all my programs and projects (even a small satisfaction; a jazz album on the piano...). But also, sixteen episodes dedicated to schools on environmental and energy problems. It was an extraordinary adventure, experienced intensely and made possible thanks to the collaboration of a large group of authors, collaborators, technicians and scientists. In turn, I tried to tell what I learned. Dear all, I think I have done my part. Try to do yours too for this difficult country of ours. A big hug
context: writing his final statement

name: Peter Eckersley
title: Australian computer scientist, computer security researcher, Wikipedian and activist.
quote: If possible, please plasticize or vitrify my brain and leave it on a shelf somewhere with a plaque or durable sticky note that says, 'scan me.'
context: written as a last message to his friends shortly before his death. His last wishes were honored and his brain was preserved by the cryonics organization Alcor Life Extension Foundation soon after his death

name: Queen Elizabeth II
title: the then-Queen of the United Kingdom and other Commonwealth realms to Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York
quote: Just be yourself, Sarah.

quote: Happy Halloween! The bats are out at Wayne Manor.

quote: Glory to Ukraine.

quote: No regrets — I had a great life.

name: ("Jesus
title: ich liebe dich.") — Pope Benedict XVI, former head of the Catholic Church
quote: Jesus, I love you.

quote: Mama.

quote: dropped two wts

quote: I love you, mama. You're the best.

name: ("この人生は楽しい人生だったわさ私はこれから多分もっと自由な世界にいってきます...アバヨ.") — Nami Sano
title: Japanese mangaka

name: ("잘 자라줘서 고맙다.") — Yoon Ki-jung
title: Korean Professor Emeritus of Applied Statistics at Yonsei University and father of President Yoon Suk Yeol.
quote: Thank you for growing up well.

name: Jimmy Buffett

name: Aner Shapira (7 October 2023)
quote: No, no.

name: Matthew Perry
title: American-Canadian actor
quote: Shoot me up with a big one
context: to his personal assistant, Kenneth Iwamasa, before dying due to acute effects of ketamine in his house in Los Angeles, California

name: Hasan Bitmez
title: Turkish MP
quote: Even if you escape the torment of history, you will not be able to escape the wrath of Allah.
context: after calling the wrath of God on the State of Israel in the Grand National Assembly of Turkey before collapsing due to a heart attack. He would die two days later

name: ("Salten ustedes primero
title: porque, si salto yo con ustedes, el helicoptero nos caerá encima a todos.") — Sebastián Piñera, former president of Chile
quote: You jump first, because if I jump with you, the helicopter will fall on all of us.
context: to his sister Margarita and both a friend and his son, in his helicopter before crashing in Lake Ranco and drowning himself in the process; the other three survived

name: ("Ваша честь
title: я пришлю вам номер своего личного счета, чтобы вы могли использовать свою огромную зарплату федерального судьи для 'разогрева' моего личного счета, потому что у меня заканчиваются деньги.") — Alexei Navalny, Russian opposition activist and political prisoner
quote: Your Honour, I will send you my personal account number so that you can use your huge salary as a federal judge to 'warm up' my personal account, because I am running out of money.
context: responding to the judge at his court hearing a day before his death

name: Aaron Bushnell
title: American military serviceman
quote: Free Palestine!
context: who set himself on fire to protest United States support for Israel in the Gaza war

name: Akira Toriyama
title: Japanese mangaka and creator of Dragon Ball
quote: Finally, I would like to thank everyone who has supported me so far! I am not sure how much more I can do, as I am not very confident about my health, probably due to my lifestyle when I was younger, but I will try my best to create more interesting pieces of work, so please continue to support me!
context: who died of an acute subdural hematoma at the age of 68

name: Willie Mays
title: African-American professional baseball center fielder
quote: I'm not able to get to Birmingham this year but will follow the game back here in the Bay Area. My heart will be with all of you who are honoring the Negro League ballplayers, who should always be remembered, including all my teammates on the Black Barons. I wanted to thank Major League Baseball, the Giants, the Cardinals and all the fans who'll be at Rickwood or watching the game. It'll be a special day, and I hope the kids will enjoy it and be inspired by it.
context: in a public statement on why he was not attending the MLB at Rickwood Field game between the San Francisco Giants and the St. Louis Cardinals on June 20. Mays died of heart failure the following day on the 18th, at the age of 93

name: Corey Comperatore
title: American former firefighter and project and tooling engineer
quote: Get down!
context: who was shielding his wife and daughter at a rally for President Donald Trump during Trump's attempted assassination. He was fatally wounded by gunfire

name: Sean "Dragoneer" Piche
title: American Internet entrepreneur, founder of Frost Dragon Art, LLC and owner of Fur Affinity
quote: Excuse me while I go throw myself in front of a train.
context: at his last Tweet. He was commentative on healthcare in the United States as it was accompanied by a screenshot of an invoice of US$22,224.54 from the University of Virginia Health System following a biopsy Piche underwent for the undetermined lung disease that would claim his life a week later

name: Fatman Scoop
title: American rapper, hype man, and radio personality
quote: If you came to party, make some noise.
context: just before collapsing during a performance. He died at a hospital the following morning

name: Tito Jackson
title: American musician
quote: I ain't feeling good in my chest.

name: Alex Salmond

name: Val Kilmer

quote: I'm ready... It's been a while.

name: ("Grazie per avermi riportato in Piazza.") — Pope Francis
title: Pope of the Catholic Church
quote: Thank you for bringing me back to the Square.

name: Glen Edward Rogers
title: American serial killer
quote: I know there's a lot of questions that you need answers to. I promise you in the near future the questions will be answered and I hope in someway will bring you closure. President Trump, keep making America great. I'm ready to go.
context: executed by lethal injection

name: Sunjay Kapur
title: Indian businessman
quote: I have swallowed something.
context: after swallowing a bee, which caused him to go into anaphylactic shock and die

name: Julian McMahon
title: Australian actor
quote: Your  [sic] awesome!!!!!
context: in a comment under his daughter Madison's Instagram post before his death

name: Andrea Gibson
title: American poet
quote: I fucking loved my life.

name: Shane Devon Tamura
title: perpetrator of the 2025 Midtown Manhattan shooting
quote: Study my brain please, I'm sorry. Tell Rick I'm sorry for everything.
context: ; in a suicide note found on his body after the shooting, implying that he suffered from CTE

name: Anas Al-Sharif
title: a Palestinian journalist reporting for Al Jazeera
quote: This is my will and my final message. If these words reach you, know that Israel has succeeded in killing me and silencing my voice. First, peace be upon you and Allah's mercy and blessings. Allah knows I gave every effort and all my strength to be a support and a voice for my people, ever since I opened my eyes to life in the alleys and streets of the Jabaliya refugee camp. My hope was that Allah would extend my life so I could return with my family and loved ones to our original town of occupied Asqalan (al-Majdal). But Allah's will came first, and His decree is final. (...) Do not forget Gaza. And do not forget me in your sincere prayers for forgiveness and acceptance.
context: in a posthumous note published on his Twitter account. Al-Sharif was assassinated in an Israeli airstrike on a media tent near Al-Shifa Hospital in Gaza City along with the rest of the Al Jazeera team

name: Charlie Kirk
title: conservative political activist and author, founder and CEO of Turning Point USA
quote: Counting or not counting gang violence?
context: responding to a question about mass shootings in the United States at his American Comeback Tour, an open-air campus event. Immediately after, he was shot and killed

name: Blaine Milam
title: American convicted murderer
quote: I would like to give a special thanks to all of you for showing me kindness, compassion, empathy, love and support and believing in me. Thank you for everything that y'all have done. I would also like to thank the directors of chaplaincy of TDCJ for opening up the faith base program on death row and allowed me to be accepted into it to find Jesus Christ our Lord and Savior. And if any of you would like to see me again, I implore all of you no matter who you are to accept Jesus Christ as you Lord and Savior and we will meet again. I love you all, bring me home Jesus.
context: prior to his execution by lethal injection

name: Anthony Todd Boyd
title: American convicted murderer
quote: I didn't kill anybody. I didn't participate in killing anybody.
context: prior to his execution by nitrogen gas
